t: Batman | Warner Bros. Entertainment Wiki | Fandom
s: Batman is a superhero created by DC Comics. One of DC’s most famous and recognizable heroes, Batman has appeared in countless media throughout his lifetime. The character was created by artist Bob Kane and writer Bill Finger, and first appeared in Detective Comics #27 (May 1939).
